publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7023 David Stewart: Congratulations to Charleston Academy Pupils—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils of Charleston Academy in Inverness for performing an entertaining version of the Match of the Day theme tune, which was filmed and shown on Sunday 19 September 2010 on the BBC Match of the Day 2 programme.

S3M-7023 David Stewart: Congratulations to Charleston Academy Pupils—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils of Charleston Academy in Inverness for performing an entertaining version of the Match of the Day theme tune, which was filmed and shown on Sunday 19 September 2010 on the BBC Match of the Day 2 programme.
